line.comment: * player joins the OCV and betrays the galaxy
* abort research projects
* abort all potential phanon quests that player might still have active
* 2.1 abort generic quests
* 2.1 remove all ship blueprints
* 2.1 remove player's ship templates
* 2.1 destroy potentially existing Phanon Colony ship

* Herobetty 5.4: Because the player no longer has access to the black market, clean up the predetermined ship arrays. If the black market was already closed, these arrays have already been deallocated in Mayhem.ActivateYakis.xml.
* Herobetty 5.4: Reset perks irrelevant to Xenon: anything to do with maintenance, insurance, food, diplomacy, and interorbital storage.
* Xenon can now terraform planets for the player
* infamy
* release mercs
* update players relations
* player's new permanent wars
* at this point Phanon becomes the main antagonist for the player because he is their only invasion target and nobody else will attack them
* updating templates. Phanon now builds their largest ships and bigger fleets
* if Phanon faction did not exist yet they now gain 6 sectors or (as of add-ons 1.2) 6% of the galaxy (whichever is greater) - reusing code from Mayhem.ActivateYakis
* Add-Ons 1.2: Clean up logic. Add more sectors if Phanon does not have enough - prevents exploit where Phanon could have 1 sector and then players joins the OCV to easily wipe out Phanon.
* We don't want to conquer weak factions.
* Herobetty 5.4: Phanon needs a jump beacon. Otherwise, they have to make long trips to space.
* Add-Ons 1.4.24: Stock newly created Phanon Outposts. Reused from PhanonCreation.
* Break if we have enough sectors.
* phanon enters a perma-alliance with every main faction
* Add Phanon ships.
* new quest to unlock all Phanon ship blueprints by destroying their faction

line.text: 'Уничтожьте Фанон, чтобы получить чертежи их кораблей.'

line.comment: * Add-Ons 1.3: No tutorial version of the message on insane mode.
* reward player by unlocking all Xenon + OCV ship blueprints
* Add-Ons 1.3: In insane mode, only 1 blueprint from each class will be given (blueprint list determined at the start of the game). TS/TP are excluded.
* Add-Ons 1.4.13: Cleaned up insane mode section. Xenon blueprint script now returns a type.
* Should never happen since this script is called in Mayhem.StartingOptions.Callbacks. This is just in case for existing games.
* remove Worker auto-quotas (because they could build non Xenon ship types even after you lost their blueprint)
* also remove Fleet reinforcement-quotas for the same reason
* Add-Ons 1.3: Insane difficulty gives a smaller fleet.

sval.val: Рассвет синтов - Трансформация
+1000 единиц дурной славы (Всего:
Прыжковый маяк Фэнонов
Постоянный союз
У Фэнон
со всем Содружеством!
Уничтожьте Фанон, чтобы получить чертежи их кораблей.
Рассвет синтов - Истребление
Службы

abort research projects
abort all potential phanon quests that player might still have active

We don't want to conquer weak factions.

phanon enters a perma-alliance with every main faction

reward player by unlocking all Xenon + OCV ship blueprints

Add-Ons 1.4.13: Cleaned up insane mode section. Xenon blueprint script now returns a type.
Should never happen since this script is called in Mayhem.StartingOptions.Callbacks. This is just in case for existing games.
remove Worker auto-quotas (because they could build non Xenon ship types even after you lost their blueprint)
also remove Fleet reinforcement-quotas for the same reason
